Hero.description: Developer passionate about learning and building digital solutions.

About.title: About me
About.paragraph1: I'm Diego, a Front-End focused developer with a degree in Computer Systems Engineering. I'm passionate about creating clean, fast, and functional interfaces, combining design and technology to build modern web experiences.
About.paragraph2: I primarily work with React, Next.js, shadcn/ui, Tailwind, and REST APIs. I specialize in transforming ideas into usable interfaces, maintaining good practices, clear architecture, and optimal performance.
About.paragraph3: Each project has been an opportunity to delve into topics like accessibility, responsive design, animations, component patterns, API consumption, and building scalable visual systems.
About.paragraph4: I'm currently looking to continue growing as a Full-Stack developer, expanding my backend and cloud skills while developing projects with professional quality and attention to detail.

Skills.title: What I bring as a developer

frontend.title: Modern Front‑End Development
frontend.text: I build interfaces with React, Next.js and reusable components, following best practices and focusing on user experience.

apis.title: API and CMS Integration
apis.text: I consume REST APIs and headless systems like Hygraph, creating clean, efficient, and fully dynamic data flows.

architecture.title: Architecture and Modularity
architecture.text: I develop complete modules within existing projects without breaking the structure, integrating logic, views, and internal configurations.

uiux.title: UI/UX and Componentization
uiux.text: I use shadcn/ui, Material UI and Tailwind to create consistent, polished interfaces focused on accessibility.

optimization.title: Optimization and Best Practices
optimization.text: I focus on performance, organization, readability and modern patterns to ensure solid and scalable code.

growth.title: Growth Mindset
growth.text: I learn fast, adapt quickly and enjoy building complete solutions with modern technologies.
